#Write a function that computes the percentage of a number n*p/100

```{r}
PCT <-function(n,p){
  n*p/100
}
```

#Per 1000
```{r}
PerMill <-function(n,p,m){
  n*p/m
}

PerMill(100,20,10)
PerMill(100,20,100)
PerMill(100,20,1000)
```
